coreAtributes.name: Mesh-undershirt
coreAtributes.description: A mesh-undershirt that's well suited for the gym or casual wear.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s mesh-undershirt and roughly pull it off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your mesh-undershirt and roughly pulls it off over your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s mesh-undershirt and roughly pulls it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.arms] through the mesh-undershirt's sleeves as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the mesh-undershirt down over [npc.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.arms] through the mesh-undershirt's sleeves, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the mesh-undershirt down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.arms] through the mesh-undershirt's sleeves before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the mesh-undershirt down over [npc2.her] head, before pulling it down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your mesh-undershirt up to just below your chin.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] mesh-undershirt up to just below [npc.her] chin.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your mesh-undershirt back down, covering your torso.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] mesh-undershirt back down to cover [npc.her] torso.
